Uses of Class
server.user.User

  • Packages that use User 
    Package Description
    server.user
    Code for user management

    • Uses of User in server.user

      Methods in server.user that return User 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static User LoginService.getCurrentUser()
      Retrieves the user logged in to the current thread or null if the current thread is logged out
      static User UserStore.getUser​(java.lang.String userId, java.security.Key decryptionKey)
      Retrieves the user with the specified userId or null if none could be found or there was an error in retrieving them
      static User UserStore.login​(java.lang.String userId, byte[] password)
      Retrieves the user with the specified userId and checks the given password against it
      Methods in server.user with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void LoginService.checkAccess​(User user)
      Checks if the currently logged in user can modify the properties of the given user
      static boolean UserStore.checkUserExistance​(User user)
      Checks if the given user is registered
      static void UserStore.createUser​(User user)
      Registers the given user and creates all required files
      static void UserStore.notifyUserChange​(User user)
      Marks the given user as modified
      static void UserStore.notifyVisibilityChange​(User user)
      Notifies that the visibility status of the specified user has changed
